<template>
  <UtilityGetFingerprint/>

  <main
  v-if="colors !== null"
  :class="[
    'w-full h-full',
    'block sm:hidden',
  ]">
  <BasicText :size="'md'" class="hidden" :text="'This website can only be accessed through a desktop device'"/>


    <LayoutMenu />

    <router-view v-slot="{ Component }" class="">
      <component :is="Component" :key="route.path"/>
    </router-view>
  </main>


  <main
  :class="[
    'absolute',
    'w-full h-full',
    'bg-gray-200',
    'hidden sm:block',
    'p-5'
  ]">
    <BasicText :size="'md'" :text="'This website can only be accessed through a desktop device'"/>
  </main>

  <LayoutGradient />


</template>

<script>

  import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'
  import LayoutMenu from '@/components/layout/LayoutMenu.vue'
  import LayoutGradient from '@/components/layout/LayoutGradient.vue'
  import BasicText from '@/components/basic/BasicText.vue'
  import UtilityGetFingerprint from '@/components/utilities/UtilityGetFingerprint.vue'


  export default {
    components: {
      LayoutMenu,
      LayoutGradient,
      UtilityGetFingerprint,
      BasicText
    },
    setup() {
      return {
        route: useRoute()
      };
    },
    computed: {
      colors() {
        return this.$store.state.colors
      },
    }
  }

</script>

<style lang="scss">
  html {
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  #app {
    @apply h-full;
  }
  body {
    @apply absolute;
    @apply h-full;
    @apply w-full;
    @apply bg-gray-200;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    html {
      // font-size: 8px;
    }
  }

</style>
